snippet: The Knicks return to Miami, improbably, with their playoff hopes narrowly alive and Amar’e Stoudemire thriving again.
abstract: New York Knicks are preparing for Game 5 of their first-round NBA playoff series with the Miami Heat; hope to stave off elimination with Miami leading 3 games to 1.
lead_paragraph: The Knicks return to Miami, improbably, with their playoff hopes narrowly alive and Amar’e Stoudemire thriving again.

headline.seo: N.B.A. Playoffs — Knicks Focus on Task, Not Regrets
headline.main: Knicks, Trailing by 3-1, Focus on What Is, Not What Might Have Been
headline.print_headline: Knicks, Trailing by 3-1, Focus on What Is, Not What Might Have Been
